message: You can't be serious with 60-40, I'm offering 80-20
I'm willing to compromise, 45-55, let's settle
You're still not moving, I'm taking a risk, going for 90-10
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you 35-65, please take it
You're really lowballing now, I'm going for 95-5, take it or leave it
I'm almost out of options, please take 25-75, I'll give you the rest
